data.quote: To lack feeling is to be dead, but to act on every feeling is to be a child.

data.quote: If you give up what you want most for what you think you should want more, you'll end up miserable.

data.quote: In the end, all men die. How you lived will be far more important to the Almighty than what you accomplished.

data.quote: Never throw the first punch. If you have to throw the second, try to make sure they don't get up for a third.

data.quote: The right belief is like a good cloak, I think. If it fits you well, it keeps you warm and safe. The wrong fit however, can suffocate.

data.quote: Sometimes a hypocrite is nothing more than a man in the process of changing.

data.quote: Faith means that it doesn't matter what happens. You can trust that somebody is watching. Trust that somebody will make it all right.
